data.title: Are you human??!
data.statement:
Given a name [[n]], determine its origin based on the following conditions:

If the name contains any numbers and a mix of uppercase and lowercase Latin characters, it is classified as an {{Alien Name}}.

If the name ends with an uppercase Latin character, it is classified as a {{Star Name}} (e.g., AncodingB, MonsterrX, AlpabitaB, RubinX, etc.).. if it does not qualify as an {{Alien Name}} (e.g., Ancoding12B, Monster2X, F2AlpabitaB, Rol3RubinX, etc.).

If neither of the above conditions are met, the name is classified as a {{Human Name}}.
Your task is to identify and return the type of name based on these conditions.

Happy Coding!
data.constraints:
The length of the string [[n]] is at least 2 and at most 100 characters.
[[n]] contains only uppercase Latin letters ({{A-Z}}), lowercase Latin letters ({{a-z}}), and digits ({{0-9}}).
The string [[n]] is non-empty.
data.inputDescription: A single string [[n]] representing the name. The string can contain Latin characters (both uppercase and lowercase) and may include numbers.
data.outputDescription: Print a single line that describes the type of given name: {{Alien Name}}, {{Star Name}} or {{Human Name}}.

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

Given a name n, determine its origin based on the following conditions:

If the name contains any numbers and a mix of uppercase and lowercase Latin characters, it is classified as an Alien Name.

If the name ends with an uppercase Latin character, it is classified as a Star Name (e.g., AncodingB, MonsterrX, AlpabitaB, RubinX, etc.).. if it does not qualify as an Alien Name (e.g., Ancoding12B, Monster2X, F2AlpabitaB, Rol3RubinX, etc.).

If neither of the above conditions are met, the name is classified as a Human Name.
Your task is to identify and return the type of name based on these conditions.

Happy Coding!
Input
A single string n representing the name. The string can contain Latin characters (both uppercase and lowercase) and may include numbers.
Output
Print a single line that describes the type of given name: Alien Name, Star Name or Human Name.
Constraints
The length of the string n is at least 2 and at most 100 characters.
n contains only uppercase Latin letters (A-Z), lowercase Latin letters (a-z), and digits (0-9).
The string n is non-empty.
Example
Input
Alien123
Output
Alien Name
